title: Dataproc - Dataproc on GKE logging
content:
## Job driver logs
See [Dataproc job logs in Logging](/dataproc/docs/guides/logging#job_logs_in) for information on configuring and viewing Dataproc on GKE Spark job driver logs.
## Cloud Logging
[Enable Logging](/stackdriver/docs/solutions/gke/installing) to view, search, filter, and archive Dataproc on GKE logs in Cloud Logging.
You can search for Spark driver and executor logs in Cloud Logging using the following labels:
- dataproc.googleapis.com/cluster-uuid =
- dataproc.googleapis.com/job-uuid =
- dataproc.googleapis.com/role
Sample queries:
```
labels."k8s-pod/dataproc_googleapis_com/cluster-uuid"="Dataproc cluster UUID"
```
```
labels."k8s-pod/dataproc_googleapis_com/job-uuid"="Dataproc job UUID"
```
```
labels."k8s-pod/dataproc_googleapis_com/role"="driver"
```
## For more information
- See [Dataproc logs](/dataproc/docs/guides/logging) for information on accessing Dataproc on GKE job and cluster logs inLogging.
